description: I'm a software developer with 2.5+ years of experience currently working on Artificial Intelligence Projects. I have a strong passion for learning new technologies and building innovative products. I have experience in building web applications,  and AI models. I have worked with various technologies like Springboot and Airflow. I have also worked on projects related to Computer Vision, Natural Language Processing, and Reinforcement Learning.
